topic.title: Anchoring the RPP to the Floor

body.p:
After moving the RPP V2 unit to its installation location, secure it to the floor:
Each unit has (6) screw-adjustable leveling feet. Adjust feet to make the unit rest level and stable on the floor. Do not screw leveling feet completely out of their holes.
Reattach the (2) seismic braces that you removed when unbolting the RPP from its pallet using the hardware you retained (see ). The seismic braces must be reattached on both the left and right sides of the RPP.
Secure the seismic braces to floor anchors. The installer must provide floor anchors.
